name: Plank Rotation

instructions.description: Start in a plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Rotate your body to one side, lifting one arm towards the ceiling while keeping your hips stable and facing the ground.
Hold the rotation for a few seconds, then return to the starting plank position.
Repeat the rotation on the other side, lifting the opposite arm towards the ceiling.

variations.description: Perform the plank rotation on your knees instead of your toes.
Add a push-up after each rotation to increase the challenge.

commentsNotes: Ensure your hips stay level throughout the rotation.
Engage your core muscles to support your spine.
Avoid overarching or rounding your back during the movement.
Focus on controlled and smooth rotations for better balance and coordination.
